title: Corporate Partner Program
copy: Join an elite group of Chicago’s business leaders in the Corporate Partner Program. Membership provides your company and employees with unique opportunities for civic involvement, special museum access, and a number of other ways to engage and inspire employees and clients. Your tax-deductible commitment directly supports the museum’s mission to diversify presentations of art, dialogues with the broader community, and learning opportunities for audiences of all backgrounds.   All Corporate Partners enjoy the following benefits: Annual Corporate Partner Day with free admission and special offers for employees and their families 10% discount on new memberships for employees Opportunities to host private meetings and events in the museum’s iconic spaces Subscription to Member Magazine Additional benefits correspond to the following membership levels:   To join the Corporate Partner Program, please contact Madeline Shearer at (312) 443-3139 or mshear1@artic.edu .
